languages.text: "Постой в сторонке, рыжий, пока я отрезаю голову Вольному Торговцу. Не хочу убивать первого в моей жизни Ангела Императора впопыхах". {n}Женщина отвечает столь же дружелюбным взглядом, и вы видите смущение на лицах окружающих.{/n}

"Stand aside, redbeard, while I cut off the Rogue Trader's head. Wouldn't want to kill my first Emperor's Angel in a hurry." {n}The woman reciprocates with an equally friendly gaze and you see confusion on the faces of those around you.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Постой в сторонке, рыжий, пока я отрезаю голову Вольному Торговцу. Не хочу убивать первого в моей жизни Ангела Императора впопыхах". {n}Женщина отвечает столь же дружелюбным взглядом, и вы видите смущение на лицах окружающих.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Stand aside, redhead, while I'm cutting off the Rogue Trader's head. Wouldn't want to kill my first Emperor's Angel in a hurry." {n}The woman reciprocates with an equally friendly gaze, and you see embarrassment on the faces of those around you.{/n}

"Stand aside, redhead, while I'm cutting off the Rogue Trader's head. Wouldn't want to kill my first Emperor's Angel in a hurry." {n}The woman reciprocates with an equally friendly gaze, and you see embarrassment on the faces of those around you.{/n}

"Stand aside, redhead, while I'm cutting off the Rogue Trader's head. Wouldn't want to kill my first Emperor's Angel in a hurry." {n}The woman reciprocates with an equally friendly gaze and you see embarrassment on the faces of those around you.{/n}

"Stand aside, redhead, while I'm cutting off the Rogue Trader's head. Wouldn't want to kill my first Emperor's Angel in a hurry." {n}The woman reciprocates with an equally friendly gaze and you see embarrassment on the faces of those around you.{/n}

"Stand aside, redbeard, while I cut off the Rogue Trader's head. Wouldn't want to kill my first Emperor's Angel in a hurry." {n}The woman reciprocates with an equally friendly gaze and you see confusion on the faces of those around you.{/n}

"Stand aside, redbeard, while I cut off the Rogue Trader's head. Wouldn't want to kill my first Emperor's Angel in a hurry." {n}The woman reciprocates with an equally friendly gaze and you see confusion on the faces of those around you.{/n}

languages.text: “靠边点，红毛脑袋，我要杀的人是行商浪人。我可不想在这么匆匆忙忙的情况下，把帝皇的天使也一起杀了。”{n}眼前的女人以同样友好的眼神，看着你周围所有的人，你看到每个人脸上都露出了疑惑的神色。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Stand aside, redbeard, while I cut off the Rogue Trader's head. Wouldn't want to kill my first Emperor's Angel in a hurry." {n}The woman reciprocates with an equally friendly gaze and you see confusion on the faces of those around you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “靠边点，红毛脑袋，我要杀的人是行商浪人。我可不想在这么匆匆忙忙的情况下，把帝皇的天使也一起杀了。”{n}眼前的女人以同样友好的眼神，看着你周围所有的人，你看到每个人脸上都露出了尴尬的神色。{/n}

languages.text: "Tretet beiseite, Rotbart, ich schneide {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} jetzt den Kopf ab. Ich will mir mit meinem ersten Engel des Imperators hübsch Zeit lassen." {n}Die Frau erwidert deinen Blick mit einem ebenso freundlichen Blick ihrerseits. Du siehst die Verwirrung in den Gesichtern der Umstehenden.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Stand aside, redbeard, while I cut off the Rogue Trader's head. Wouldn't want to kill my first Emperor's Angel in a hurry." {n}The woman reciprocates with an equally friendly gaze and you see confusion on the faces of those around you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Tretet beiseite, Rotschopf, ich schneide {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} jetzt den Kopf ab. Ich will mir mit meinem ersten Engel des Imperators hübsch Zeit lassen." {n}Die Frau erwidert deinen Blick mit einem ebenso freundlichen Blick ihrerseits. Du siehst die Scham in den Gesichtern der Umstehenden.{/n}

languages.text: «Barbarroja, espera a un lado mientras decapito a {mf|este|esta} Comerciante Independiente. Serás el primer Ángel del Emperador que mato, y no quiero hacerlo con prisas». {n}La mujer le corresponde con una mirada igualmente cordial, y adviertes las expresiones avergonzadas de todos los que te rodean.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Stand aside, redbeard, while I cut off the Rogue Trader's head. Wouldn't want to kill my first Emperor's Angel in a hurry." {n}The woman reciprocates with an equally friendly gaze and you see confusion on the faces of those around you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Pelirrojo, espera a un lado mientras decapito a {mf|este|esta} Comerciante Independiente. Serás el primer Ángel del Emperador que mato, y no quiero hacerlo con prisas». {n}La mujer le corresponde con una mirada igualmente cordial, y adviertes las expresiones avergonzadas de todos los que te rodean.{/n}

languages.text: « Écartez-vous, barbe-rousse, j'ai la tête {mf|d'un libre-marchand|d'une libre-marchande} à trancher. Je n'ai pas envie de tuer mon premier ange de l'Empereur à la va-vite, » {n}dit-elle en lui rendant son regard amical, une réaction qui décontenance ceux qui vous entourent.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Stand aside, redbeard, while I cut off the Rogue Trader's head. Wouldn't want to kill my first Emperor's Angel in a hurry." {n}The woman reciprocates with an equally friendly gaze and you see confusion on the faces of those around you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Écartez-vous, le rouquin, j'ai la tête {mf|d'un libre-marchand|d'une libre-marchande} à trancher. Je n'ai pas envie de tuer mon premier ange de l'Empereur à la va-vite, » {n}dit-elle en lui rendant son regard amical, une réaction qui cause l'embarras de ceux qui vous entourent.{/n}

languages.text: 「赤毛、自由開拓者の首を切り落とすから、そこをどいて。初めて皇帝の天使を殺すのに慌ただしいのは嫌だわ」{n}彼女が同じように友好的なまなざしで応えると、周囲の人々が困惑した表情を浮かべているのが見える。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Stand aside, redbeard, while I cut off the Rogue Trader's head. Wouldn't want to kill my first Emperor's Angel in a hurry." {n}The woman reciprocates with an equally friendly gaze and you see confusion on the faces of those around you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「赤毛、自由開拓者の首を切り落とすから、そこをどいて。初めて皇帝の天使を殺すのに慌ただしいのは嫌だわ」{n}彼女が同じように友好的なまなざしで応えると、周囲の人々が困惑した表情を浮かべているのが見える。{/n}

languages.text: "Ben Hür Tacir'in kellesini alırken kenarda dur kızıl sakal. İlk İmparator'un Meleği avımın canını alırken acele etmek istemem." {n}Kadın, aynı şekilde dostane bir bakışla karşılık veriyor. Etrafındaki yüzlerdeki şaşkınlığı görebiliyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Stand aside, redbeard, while I cut off the Rogue Trader's head. Wouldn't want to kill my first Emperor's Angel in a hurry." {n}The woman reciprocates with an equally friendly gaze and you see confusion on the faces of those around you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ben Hür Tacir'in kellesini alırken kenarda dur kızıl sakal. İlk İmparator Meleğimi öldürürken acele etmek istemem." {n}Kadın eşit derecede dostane bir bakışla karşılık veriyor. Etrafındaki yüzlerdeki şaşkınlığı görebiliyorsun.{/n}
